description: A modern, minimalist website showcasing Vedansh Sharma's portfolio as a full-stack developer. The website should feature a clean, professional design with a focus on highlighting his skills in Next.js, React, Vite, FastAPI, and Python. Include sections showcasing his experience with Chitkara University Research and Innovation Network, PhysicsWallah, Fintrack, and Coding Ninjas CUIET. Each project should have a brief description, screenshots, and links to their respective repositories.
